text:
Heidi Klum's boyfriend claims that photos of him allegedly kissing another woman in London is a big "misinterpretation."

In a statement to ET on Saturday, Vito Schnabel explains that the situation was completely "innocent."

WATCH: Heidi Klum Rocks a Teeny Bikini on Beach Date With Vito Schnabel

"The claims that have been made are a misinterpretation of an entirely innocent situation," Schnabel says. "There is nothing more to this than I was simply saying goodnight to a family friend and we went our separate ways."

Schnabel and Klum, who have been together since 2014, are still together, according to their rep.

In an interview with ET in February, Klum told ET that she's very romantic with her younger beau.

"I'm very romantic and old fashioned," she said, before teasing their Valentine's Day plans.

WATCH: Heidi Klum Opens Up About Being a Nudist and Her Younger Boyfriend Vito Schnabel

Reporting by Jennifer Peros.

See more in the video below.
title: Heidi Klum's Boyfriend Vito Schnabel Responds After Photos Surface of Him Allegedly Kissing Another
